title: Carrot tops pesto
intro: During my first visit in Ardèche, I was mindblown to discover (from Sam and Aurélie) that you could use carrot, radish (or many different kinds of veggies) tops to make a wonderful pesto. I will always remember Sam cutting carrot tops in record time with his special pesto knife!

ingMand: A small handful of pine kernel (or any kind of seed or nut)

insSteps: Simple, just blend everything (or do it by hand the manual way).
If you want to save this pesto for later, it can be stored up to two weeks in the fridge (with enough olive oil on top).

notes: If using nuts, you can pre-roast them.
